1: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> תֵצֵ֨א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>When thou goest out</n> לַמִּלְחָמָ֜ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>to battle</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> אֹיְבֶ֗יךָ <sup>341 </sup> <n>against thine enemies</n> וְֽרָאִ֜יתָ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>and seest</n> ס֤וּס <sup>5483 </sup> <n>horses</n> וָרֶ֙כֶב֙ <sup>7393 </sup> <n>and chariots</n> עַ֚ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>[and] a people</n> רַ֣ב <sup>7227 </sup> <n>more</n> מִמְּךָ֔ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>than</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>do</n> תִירָ֖א <sup>3372 </sup> <n>than thou be not afraid</n> מֵהֶ֑ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> יְהוָ֤ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of them for the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> עִמָּ֔ךְ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> הַמַּֽעַלְךָ֖ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>[is] with thee which brought thee up</n> מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>out of the land</n> מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n>
2: וְהָיָ֕ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כְּקָֽרָבְכֶ֖ם <sup>7126 </sup> <n>And it shall be when ye are come nigh</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>unto the battle</n> וְנִגַּ֥שׁ <sup>5066 </sup> <n>shall approach</n> הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <sup>3548 </sup> <n>that the priest</n> וְדִבֶּ֥ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and speak</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הָעָֽם׃ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>unto the people</n>
3: וְאָמַ֤ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And shall say</n> אֲלֵהֶם֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> שְׁמַ֣ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>unto them Hear</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>O Israel</n> אַתֶּ֨ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>ye</n> קְרֵבִ֥ים <sup>7131 </sup> <n>ye approach</n> הַיּ֛וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>this day</n> לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>unto battle</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> אֹיְבֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>341 </sup> <n>against your enemies</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> יֵרַ֣ךְ <sup>7401 </sup> <n>faint</n> לְבַבְכֶ֗ם <sup>3824 </sup> <n>let not your hearts</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּֽירְא֧וּ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>fear</n> וְאַֽל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תַּחְפְּז֛וּ <sup>2648 </sup> <n>not and do not tremble</n> וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תַּֽעַרְצ֖וּ <sup>6206 </sup> <n>neither be ye terrified</n> מִפְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>because</n>
4: כִּ֚י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>For the LORD</n> אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n> הַהֹלֵ֖ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>[is] he that goeth</n> עִמָּכֶ֑ם <sup>5973 </sup> <n>against</n> לְהִלָּחֵ֥ם <sup>3898 </sup> <n>with you to fight</n> לָכֶ֛ם עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>against</n> אֹיְבֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>341 </sup> <n>for you against your enemies</n> לְהוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>to save</n> אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <sup>853 </sup>
5: וְדִבְּר֣וּ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>shall speak</n> הַשֹּֽׁטְרִים֮ <sup>7860 </sup> <n>And the officers</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הָעָ֣ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>unto the people</n> לֵאמֹר֒ <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> מִֽי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> הָאִ֞ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>What man</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>that</n> בָּנָ֤ה <sup>1129 </sup> <n>[is there] that hath built</n> בַֽיִת־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> חָדָשׁ֙ <sup>2319 </sup> <n>a new</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> חֲנָכ֔וֹ <sup>2596 </sup> <n>and hath not dedicated</n> יֵלֵ֖ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>depart</n> וְיָשֹׁ֣ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and return</n> לְבֵית֑וֹ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>to his house</n> פֶּן־ <sup>6435 </sup> <n>otherwise</n> יָמוּת֙ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>lest he die</n> בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>in the battle</n> וְאִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> אַחֵ֖ר <sup>312 </sup> <n>and another</n> יַחְנְכֶֽנּוּ׃ <sup>2596 </sup> <n>dedicate</n>
6: וּמִֽי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> הָאִ֞ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>And what man</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>that</n> נָטַ֥ע <sup>5193 </sup> <n>[is he] that hath planted</n> כֶּ֙רֶם֙ <sup>3754 </sup> <n>a vineyard</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> חִלְּל֔וֹ <sup>2490 </sup> <n>and hath not [yet] eaten</n> יֵלֵ֖ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>along</n> וְיָשֹׁ֣ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and return</n> לְבֵית֑וֹ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>unto his house</n> פֶּן־ <sup>6435 </sup> <n>otherwise</n> יָמוּת֙ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>lest he die</n> בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>in the battle</n> וְאִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> אַחֵ֖ר <sup>312 </sup> <n>and another</n> יְחַלְּלֶֽנּוּ׃ <sup>2490 </sup> <n>eat</n>
7: וּמִֽי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>and who</n> הָאִ֞ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>And what man</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>is</n> אֵרַ֤שׂ <sup>781 </sup> <n>[is there] that hath betrothed</n> אִשָּׁה֙ <sup>802 </sup> <n>a wife</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> לְקָחָ֔הּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and hath not taken</n> יֵלֵ֖ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>depart</n> וְיָשֹׁ֣ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and return</n> לְבֵית֑וֹ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>unto his house</n> פֶּן־ <sup>6435 </sup> <n>otherwise</n> יָמוּת֙ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>lest he die</n> בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>in the battle</n> וְאִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> אַחֵ֖ר <sup>312 </sup> <n>and another</n> יִקָּחֶֽנָּה׃ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>take</n>
8: וְיָסְפ֣וּ <sup>3254 </sup> <n>further</n> הַשֹּׁטְרִים֮ <sup>7860 </sup> <n>And the officers</n> לְדַבֵּ֣ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>shall speak</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הָעָם֒ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>unto the people</n> וְאָמְר֗וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and they shall say</n> מִי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> הָאִ֤ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>What man</n> הַיָּרֵא֙ <sup>3373 </sup> <n>[is there that is] fearful</n> וְרַ֣ךְ <sup>7390 </sup> <n>faint</n> הַלֵּבָ֔ב <sup>3824 </sup> <n>heart</n> יֵלֵ֖ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>along</n> וְיָשֹׁ֣ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and return</n> לְבֵית֑וֹ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>unto his house</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִמַּ֛ס <sup>4549 </sup> <n>faint</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> לְבַ֥ב <sup>3824 </sup> <n>as well as his heart</n> אֶחָ֖יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>lest his brethren's</n> כִּלְבָבֽוֹ׃ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>hearts</n>
9: וְהָיָ֛ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כְּכַלֹּ֥ת <sup>3615 </sup> <n>have made an end</n> הַשֹּׁטְרִ֖ים <sup>7860 </sup> <n>And it shall be when the officers</n> לְדַבֵּ֣ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>of speaking</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הָעָ֑ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>unto the people</n> וּפָ֥קְד֛וּ <sup>6485 </sup> <n>that they shall make</n> שָׂרֵ֥י <sup>8269 </sup> <n>captains</n> צְבָא֖וֹת <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of the armies</n> בְּרֹ֥אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>to lead</n> הָעָֽם׃ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n> ס
10: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> תִקְרַ֣ב <sup>7126 </sup> <n>When thou comest nigh</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> עִ֔יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>unto a city</n> לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <sup>3898 </sup> <n>to fight</n> עָלֶ֑יהָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> וְקָרָ֥אתָ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>against it then proclaim</n> אֵלֶ֖יהָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>of</n> לְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <sup>7965 </sup> <n>peace</n>
11: וְהָיָה֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall become</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> שָׁל֣וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>of peace</n> תַּֽעַנְךָ֔ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>And it shall be if it make thee answer</n> וּפָתְחָ֖ה <sup>6605 </sup> <n>and open</n> לָ֑ךְ וְהָיָ֞ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall become</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָעָ֣ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>unto thee then it shall be [that] all the people</n> הַנִּמְצָא־ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>[that is] found</n> בָ֗הּ יִהְי֥וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall become</n> לְךָ֛ לָמַ֖ס <sup>4522 </sup> <n>therein shall be tributaries</n> וַעֲבָדֽוּךָ׃ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>unto thee and they shall serve</n>
12: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> תַשְׁלִים֙ <sup>7999 </sup> <n>And if it will make no peace</n> עִמָּ֔ךְ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>against</n> וְעָשְׂתָ֥ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>with thee but will make</n> עִמְּךָ֖ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>against</n> מִלְחָמָ֑ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>war</n> וְצַרְתָּ֖ <sup>6696 </sup> <n>against thee then thou shalt besiege</n> עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n>
13: וּנְתָנָ֛הּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>hath delivered</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And when the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>it into thine hands</n> וְהִכִּיתָ֥ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>thou shalt smite</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> זְכוּרָ֖הּ <sup>2138 </sup> <n>every male</n> לְפִי־ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>thereof with the edge</n> חָֽרֶב׃ <sup>2719 </sup> <n>of the sword</n>
14: רַ֣ק <sup>7535 </sup> <n>but</n> הַ֠נָּשִׁים <sup>802 </sup> <n>But the women</n> וְהַטַּ֨ף <sup>2945 </sup> <n>and the little ones</n> וְהַבְּהֵמָ֜ה <sup>929 </sup> <n>and the cattle</n> וְכֹל֩ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יִהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>is in</n> בָעִ֛יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>and all that is in the city</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> שְׁלָלָ֖הּ <sup>7998 </sup> <n>[even] all the spoil</n> תָּבֹ֣ז <sup>962 </sup> <n>thereof shalt thou take</n> לָ֑ךְ וְאָֽכַלְתָּ֙ <sup>398 </sup> <n>unto thyself and thou shalt eat</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁלַ֣ל <sup>7998 </sup> <n>the spoil</n> אֹיְבֶ֔יךָ <sup>341 </sup> <n>of thine enemies</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> נָתַ֛ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>hath given</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> לָֽךְ׃
15: כֵּ֤ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Thus</n> תַּעֲשֶׂה֙ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>Thus shalt thou do</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to all</n> הֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>unto all the cities</n> הָרְחֹקֹ֥ת <sup>7350 </sup> <n>far off</n> מִמְּךָ֖ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>that</n> מְאֹ֑ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>[which are] very</n> אֲשֶׁ֛ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>are not</n> מֵעָרֵ֥י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>[are] not of the cities</n> הַגּֽוֹיִם־ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of these nations</n> הָאֵ֖לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>of these</n> הֵֽנָּה׃ <sup>2007 </sup> <n>from thee which</n>
16: רַ֗ק <sup>7535 </sup> <n>in</n> מֵעָרֵ֤י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>But of the cities</n> הָֽעַמִּים֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of these people</n> הָאֵ֔לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>of these</n> אֲשֶׁר֙ <sup>834 </sup> <n>that</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> נֹתֵ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>doth give</n> לְךָ֖ נַחֲלָ֑ה <sup>5159 </sup> <n>thee [for] an inheritance</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תְחַיֶּ֖ה <sup>2421 </sup> <n>thou shalt save alive</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>anything</n> נְשָׁמָֽה׃ <sup>5397 </sup> <n>nothing that breatheth</n>
17: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הַחֲרֵ֣ם <sup>2763 </sup> <n>But thou shalt utterly</n> תַּחֲרִימֵ֗ם <sup>2763 </sup> <n>destroy</n> הַחִתִּ֤י <sup>2850 </sup> <n>them [namely] the Hittites</n> וְהָאֱמֹרִי֙ <sup>567 </sup> <n>and the Amorites</n> הַכְּנַעֲנִ֣י <sup>3669 </sup> <n>the Canaanites</n> וְהַפְּרִזִּ֔י <sup>6522 </sup> <n>and the Perizzites</n> הַחִוִּ֖י <sup>2340 </sup> <n>the Hivites</n> וְהַיְבוּסִ֑י <sup>2983 </sup> <n>and the Jebusites</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> צִוְּךָ֖ <sup>6680 </sup> <n>hath commanded</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>as the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n>
18: לְמַ֗עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>so</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>may not</n> יְלַמְּד֤וּ <sup>3925 </sup> <n>That they teach</n> אֶתְכֶם֙ <sup>853 </sup> לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <sup>6213 </sup> <n>you not to do</n> כְּכֹל֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to all</n> תּֽוֹעֲבֹתָ֔ם <sup>8441 </sup> <n>after all their abominations</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עָשׂ֖וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>which they have done</n> לֵֽאלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>unto their gods</n> וַחֲטָאתֶ֖ם <sup>2398 </sup> <n>so should ye sin</n> לַיהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>against the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n> ס
19: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> תָצ֣וּר <sup>6696 </sup> <n>When thou shalt besiege</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> עִיר֩ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>a city</n> יָמִ֨ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>time</n> רַבִּ֜ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>a long</n> לְֽהִלָּחֵ֧ם <sup>3898 </sup> <n>in making war</n> עָלֶ֣יהָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> לְתָפְשָׂ֗הּ <sup>8610 </sup> <n>against it to take</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תַשְׁחִ֤ית <sup>7843 </sup> <n>it thou shalt not destroy</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֵצָהּ֙ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>the trees</n> לִנְדֹּ֤חַ <sup>5080 </sup> <n>thereof by forcing</n> עָלָיו֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> גַּרְזֶ֔ן <sup>1631 </sup> <n>an axe</n> כִּ֚י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> מִמֶּ֣נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> תֹאכֵ֔ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>against them for thou mayest eat</n> וְאֹת֖וֹ <sup>853 </sup> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תִכְרֹ֑ת <sup>3772 </sup> <n>of them and thou shalt not cut them down</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> הָֽאָדָם֙ <sup>120 </sup> <n>[is] man's</n> עֵ֣ץ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>(for the tree</n> הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>of the field</n> לָבֹ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>[life]) to employ</n> מִפָּנֶ֖יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>accept</n> בַּמָּצֽוֹר׃ <sup>4692 </sup> <n>should be besieged</n>
20: רַ֞ק <sup>7535 </sup> <n>but</n> עֵ֣ץ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>Only the trees</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> תֵּדַ֗ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>which thou knowest</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> עֵ֤ץ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>that they [be] not trees</n> מַאֲכָל֙ <sup>3978 </sup> <n>for meat</n> ה֔וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> אֹת֥וֹ <sup>853 </sup> תַשְׁחִ֖ית <sup>7843 </sup> <n>thou shalt destroy</n> וְכָרָ֑תָּ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>and cut them down</n> וּבָנִ֣יתָ <sup>1129 </sup> <n>and thou shalt build</n> מָצ֗וֹר <sup>4692 </sup> <n>bulwarks</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> הָעִיר֙ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>against the city</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> הִ֨וא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>that</n> עֹשָׂ֧ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that maketh</n> עִמְּךָ֛ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> מִלְחָמָ֖ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>war</n> עַ֥ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> רִדְתָּֽהּ׃ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>with thee until it be subdued</n> פ
